whyUs.label: Why Us
whyUs.title: The founder-led advantage
whyUs.intro: When you work with a boutique studio, you get something larger agencies can't offer—direct access, personal accountability, and the agility to move fast.
whyUs.directPartnershipDesc: Work directly with the founder and decision-maker. No account managers, no telephone game—clear communication from start to finish.
whyUs.personalInvestmentDesc: Every project carries my reputation. You get the same dedication and attention to detail whether it's a small feature or a full product.
whyUs.endToEndDesc: One expert sees your project from concept to completion. No handoffs between teams, no context lost in translation.
whyUs.agilityDesc: Quick decisions, flexible scope, and real responsiveness. No committees to consult or processes to navigate.

founder.label: Meet the Founder
founder.title: The person behind the pixels
founder.name: Filip Melnic
founder.intro: I'm a software developer who believes great work comes from genuine collaboration. After years of working in agencies and startups, I founded Strawhat Digital to do things differently—to build software with care, transparency, and a personal touch.
founder.philosophy: Every project I take on gets my full attention. I don't juggle dozens of clients or hand your work off to junior developers. When you work with Strawhat Digital, you work with me directly, from the first conversation to the final launch.
founder.personalTouch: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source, or enjoying a good cup of coffee. The straw hat? It's a reminder not to take things too seriously—even when the work absolutely is.

legal.privacyMeta: Privacy Policy for Straw Hat Digital
legal.termsMeta: Terms of Service for Straw Hat Digital

privacy.overviewText: Straw Hat Digital ("we", "our", or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting the personal information you share with us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or engage our services.
privacy.infoWeCollectIntro: We may collect the following types of information:
privacy.contactInfoText: Name, email address, phone number, and company name when you reach out to us through our contact form.
privacy.projectInfoText: Details about your project requirements, budget, and timeline that you provide during consultations.
privacy.usageDataText: Anonymous information about how you interact with our website, including pages visited and time spent.
privacy.howWeUseIntro: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.howWeUse1: Respond to your inquiries and provide requested services
privacy.howWeUse2: Communicate with you about projects and updates
privacy.howWeUse4: Send occasional updates about our services (with your consent)
privacy.sharingIntro: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties. We may share information only in the following circumstances:
privacy.sharing1: With service providers who assist in our operations
privacy.sharing2: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.cookiesText: Our website may use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help us understand how you use our site. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, though this may affect some website functionality.
privacy.yourRights1: Access the personal information we hold about you
privacy.yourRights3: Request deletion of your personal information
privacy.contactUsText: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at:
privacy.changesToPolicyText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

terms.agreementText: By accessing or using the services provided by Straw Hat Digital ("we", "our", or "us"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
terms.servicesText: Straw Hat Digital provides product development, design, and engineering services. The specific scope, deliverables, and terms of each project will be defined in a separate agreement or statement of work between you and Straw Hat Digital.
terms.clientResponsibilitiesIntro: When engaging our services, you agree to:
terms.clientResp1: Provide accurate and complete information necessary for the project
terms.clientResp2: Respond to requests for feedback and approvals in a timely manner
terms.clientResp3: Ensure you have the rights to any content or materials you provide
terms.clientResp4: Make payments according to the agreed-upon schedule
terms.ipIntro: Unless otherwise specified in a project agreement:
terms.ip1: Upon full payment, you will own the final deliverables created specifically for your project
terms.ip2: We retain ownership of any pre-existing tools, frameworks, or methodologies used in the project
terms.ip3: We may use non-confidential aspects of the project in our portfolio unless otherwise agreed
terms.confidentialityText: We agree to keep confidential any proprietary information you share with us during our engagement. This includes business strategies, technical specifications, and any information marked as confidential. This obligation does not apply to information that is publicly available or independently developed.
terms.paymentIntro: Payment terms will be specified in your project agreement. Unless otherwise stated:
terms.payment1: A deposit may be required before work begins
terms.payment2: Invoices are due within 14 days of receipt
terms.payment3: Late payments may incur additional fees or work suspension
terms.limitationText: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Straw Hat Digital shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of our services. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the specific services giving rise to the claim.
terms.warrantiesText: We warrant that our services will be performed in a professional and workmanlike manner. We do not warrant that deliverables will be error-free or that they will meet all of your requirements unless specifically stated in the project agreement.
terms.terminationText: Either party may terminate a project agreement with written notice. Upon termination, you will be responsible for payment for all work completed up to the termination date. Provisions regarding intellectual property, confidentiality, and limitation of liability shall survive termination.
terms.governingLawText: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws, without regard to conflict of law principles.
terms.changesToTermsText: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be effective upon posting to our website. Your continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.
